TopicTitle: Can I add a tab to the spaceport - editor?

Articles.Content:
When I'm in the hanger or the rocket assembly hanger, is there any way to add another tab or subdivide all the parts I've collected into smaller categories?

Did I ask this correctly?
There's a mod that does that, but I'm not sure if it works correctly atm (subasambly loader)
Not officially but someone made a hot fix(all it does is move the icon out of the flag selector icon)
